author: Nio Kasgami
description:
==============================================================================================
★ Official main menu add-on for RPM ★
==============================================================================================

Add icon to the main menu commands

HOW TO USE : 

As of 1.7, the main menu have now  a system customisation using Array or "List". 
the plugin will sync with your command in the System Tab. it just need to know which ID the icon you want.

so if command Item is in index 0 then the position of the icon ID should be in the same position in the array.

example : 

commands = [ "ITEM","ARMOR"]
icons = [ICONID,ICONID]
etc
just follow the order of your main menu list.
name: RPM_MainMenuCommandIcon
